title: The Discoverers (Daniel J. Boorstin)
description:
Title: The Discoverers - A History of Man's Search to Know His World and Himself
Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Narrator: Christopher Cazenove
Format: Abridged Audiobook (MP3) + Unabridged Ebook (PDF)

The first volume of historian Daniel J. Boorstin's "Knowledge Trilogy". The first volume, The Discoverers, covers explorers, scientists, and historians in their quest for raw knowledge. The second volume, The Creators, describes writers, painters, and composers in their pursuit of inspiring art. The third and final volume, The Seekers, describes people searching for an understanding of human existence itself
